content: n a t i c a c o w l the natica cowl is knitted in the round and then joined end to end to form a double layer of warm silky texture two sections joined by a lateral braid repeat along the cowl making a long loop that twists around the neck twice yarn irish artisan yarns 4 ply 70% baby alpaca 30% silk 100g - 400m colour a 1 skein natural colour b 1 skein mizen-head gauge 26 sts and 35 rnds over 10cm 4 after blocking knitted in the round with 3 25mm needles in stockinette needles & notions 3 25mm circular needles for knitting in the round 1 stitch marker 3mm crochet hook sizes one size 120cm length joined into a circle 40cm tube circumference once the sections have been established more or fewer can be put together to customise the length of this cowl it is designed to have 8 sections that totals 120cm in length pattern copyright©thecolourfulknit 2019 all rights reserved page 1 of 3 schematic abbreviations k knit yo yarn over bor beginning of round round round notes how to work lateral braid 1 k1 make 1 stitch so you have two stitches on the right hand needle 2 pass 1 stitch from the right hand needle to the left 3 knit through the back loop of the second stitch on the left hand needle but don t remove it from the needle 4 knit into the front of the first stitch on the left hand needle and remove sts onto the right hand needle 5 repeat from point 2 until the row is complete 6 on the last stitch of the row knit through the back of both 2 sts on the left hand needle pattern copyright©thecolourfulknit 2019 all rights reserved page 2 of 3 directions cast on 110 stitches and join to knit in the round taking care not to twist the stitches begin section 1 place a bor marker section 1 round 1 & 2 knit using colour a round 3 & 4 knit using colour b these 4 rnds form the stripe pattern repeat rnds 1 to 4 until piece measures 15cm or until 52 rnds have been completed using colour a knit a lateral braid for the complete round see notes on page 2 section 2 using colour b round 1 *k3 with left hand needle lift the first of the 3 stitches just knitted over the last 2 yo repeat from * to last 2 stitches k2 round 2 knit all stitches round 3 k1 *yo k3 with left hand needle lift the first of the 3 stitches just knitted over the last 2 repeat from * to last 1 stitch k1 round 4 knit all stitches repeat these 4 rnds until a total of 52 rnds have been completed using colour a knit a lateral braid for the complete round see notes on page 2 repeat these two sections until 8 sections have been completed sections
